https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Captured in "candid polaroid pictures", the characters of Ravenhill's new play are a former social rebel who served time for murder for political reasons, his exâ€“girlfriend who made the usual way for many "from hippie to yuppie", a nightclub stripper who is regularly beaten by her boyfriend, a gay man dying of AIDS and a sex slave he bought. This is a play about the vicissitudes of love, which, "without knowing shame", can arise from any "bullshit". Candid Polaroids
